thread.section_title: Hotel Banke - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel in very good location
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel in very good location - Review of Hotel Banke, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ana S
title: Lovely hotel in very good location
text:
I really enjoyed my stay in the hotel. The staff was so nice and lovely (specially Hugo who took care of us from since we arrived to the hotel). We also asked to get an upgrade and they were very kind as they showed us at least 3 different ones.
The location of the hotel is very good - 10 mins walking to the Louvre.
I give four stars because some of the first rooms that were shown to us were quite small and with no views.
